thread.title: DTC Marketing Manager - Sports Equipment

title: DTC Marketing Manager - Sports Equipment
text: Make Your Passion Your Career. â„¢ Work In Sports. Region Map Here is the job that interests you: DTC Marketing Manager Posted/Updated: 10-21-2015 Brief Job Description: Primary role is to deliver the pinnacle brand expression via primary & secondary product story telling, driving traffic, and activating brand activations & promotions.   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
